actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing concern over the conditions of ethnic Albanians living in the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares that the Congress: (1) is concerned over the political and economic conditions of ethnic Albanians in Yugoslavia; (2) urges the Government of Yugoslavia to act to ensure that human rights as contained in the Helsinki Accords and the Concluding Document of Madrid are respected; (3) calls upon such Government to review the cases of ethnic Albanians imprisoned on political charges and to release those who have not advocated violence; and (4) requests the President to direct the Department of State to convey the contents of this resolution to the Government of Yugoslavia.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing concern over the conditions of ethnic Albanians living in the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.
